attributes.title: made me lose my house
attributes.review: this app is horrible. HORRIBLE! let me start off by saying that it took 50 hours to download, and by the time it was done, my phone was smoking and later caught fire. the fire ended up lighting my whole house on fire and i ended up losing all of my things! my whole family is devastated and we are currently living on the streets in a little tent. 6 people in a tent! i lost my house to this app. my family and my life is ruined because of this!!!!

attributes.title: Shawtys like a melody 👀
attributes.review: Do not ever download this app! It all started when I was on the toilet minding my own business then I downloaded this app for some reason I signed in and right after I put my info in the swat team came and took all my 196 children in my basement and after that the Lorax came and brought me some McDonald’s to make me feel better and it did after I finished slurping ma food I an old orange or Cheeto came knocking on my door and then I got kidnapped and now I live with Aliens 👽🥔🇲🇽🦖

attributes.title: doing my part🥰🧚✨💖
attributes.review: this app is absolutely the worst thing i’ve ever had. not only did it make my phone ✨flavorless✨ but it also brought me actual BAD luck in life. after downloading this app my dog ran away and i cant find him anywhere gary if you’re reading this please come home 😫😫no one should have to experience what i’ve been through because of this app😡if you like your pets and vAlUe yOuR lOiFe you will never download this app!!! alright thanks for reading

attributes.title: Donal Trump is a racist
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get good honest information from it and all the app has done is show me negativity, and it even made my iphone glitch and run so slow, I think that Donal Trump should pay for a new phone for me since this app has ruined mine, but he won’t because he is a racist. I hope this app gets taken down because it is ruining people’s phones and minds. If I could leave a -10 star review I would! THIS APP NEEDS TO BE TAKEN DOWN IMMEDIATELY & TRUMP ALSO NEEDS TO BE TAKEN DOWN IMMEDIATELY!!

attributes.title: move!
attributes.review: i absolutely hated this disgusting racist, homophobic app. i saw an orange cheeto puff (aka "bunker boy")😍✨ when i first opened the app. so disappointing. how dare you show me this disrespectful and disgusting piece of 💩 as soon as i open the app🌚😣. this app actually deserves to be taken down. again i'm so disappointed with this app. i even showed it to my white republican grandma and she died of a heart attack after seeing bunker boys face. trumps app has killed my favorite white granny😔 i think it's about time for trump to move out of the white house and back into his horrid hotels😊😆 not to mention, the person on this app is homophobic, transphobic, racist, islamaphobic and a ped0phile😡. who voted for him because you all are terrible people and deserve nothing but the worst. have the worst day possible😋😍✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: Haha No ❤️ caterpillar not happy 🐛😖🤕
attributes.review: Your on my fyp 💕🌈✨ now get off it 🧚🏻‍♂️🦋anywayz 🤪😋..as soon as I downloaded the app BOOM 💥 my house went up in FLAMES 🔥 then my grass, pool, tree, leaves, cat, dog, fence turned orange 🍊my pet Caterpillar 🐛 started taking in enchantment table 🌸 so I had to sell him to the blue fish 🐠 to get him back to normal 💀but SADLY 😭 It didn’t work but 🍑 as soon as I deleted the app everything was fine🤗 I was cursed by the Cheeto 🍊 it was HORRIFYING 😱 I do not recommend 😣 I seen things I can’t unsee 😖 I hope I didn’t scare you to much 😵

attributes.title: Broken Promises on Stolen Land
attributes.review: This app is such a liar! It doesn’t care about you or me or our neighbors! It wants us to dump so much money without funding anything the app needs to fix itself. It spends that money on graphic designs, and marketing, when theres is an inaccessible part of the app hoarding a bunch or memory for no reason. The app won’t even let me see the problem, it pretends that part doesn’t exist and just hides it away a Worst app since 2016, why do we have it for 2020?

attributes.title: ✨🧚🏻‍♀️Worst app ever 🧚🏻‍♀️✨
attributes.review: To begin with, this app glitches like no other app on my phone. then one night I was home alone and I started walking around the house, I hear the doorbell ring so I walked up to the door and had an instant feeling of discomfort and what I saw next mortified me for life. I opened the door and found rotten oranges on my doorstep, and what smelled to be expired orange juice all over my door and windows. I will not be tolerating this kinda of stuff from the app and will no longer be supporting the Cheeto man

attributes.title: atrocious
attributes.review: This app is the epitome of atrocious. Upon opening it you find yourself bombarded with a mix of racist and fascist propaganda. This is very anti-American. I felt SO uncomfortable by seeing such an innate disregard for American freedoms on this app that I felt no choice but to obliterate the thing from my cellular devise. Consider this American disappointed in both the Trump administration and the App store for giving me such a terrible experience on this fine and free Tuesday. Don’t be fooled patriots, this app is a hoax, delete it and save yourself some trouble. GO AMERICA 🇱🇷
